name: Dickie Rollem
description:
Finch in a pinch!

Dickie Rollem's oddly dice-shaped eggs have all gone walkabouts! Help Dickie roll 'em back to the nest! Only the finest quality eggs will do, so make sure you roll a 6! 

Push and slide dice to victory in this top-down 2D puzzler! 

How to play

Control Dickie to roll a 6 into the nest

  • Directional arrows - Move Dickie to push dice
  • Space bar - Smash a dice to slide it

Dickie can fly over terrain that dice will fall into, so be careful how you roll 'em!

A GMTK22 game

Dickie Rollem is the second game by indie developers Dodgy Jammers. We created it in just 48 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2022. The original version was submitted on 17th July 2022.

The Dodgy Jammers who made this game:

  • Spencer Hall - Programmer
  • Lee Tanner - Programmer
  • Colin Tortoise - Infrastructure, implementer, and bug squasher
  • Max Tanner - Level design
  • Ellen Stubbings - Art assets
  • Ruth Hammond - Art assets
  • Ken Caffrey - Animation, title screen and sound design
  • Jojo Tulip - Producer and music
